game_description: This is an interesting VR sports competitive game. You play as a gorilla. The locomotion is inspired by Gorilla Tag. You can run, jump, and hit the ball using only your hands. The rules are the same as soccer. This game is free, and you can play with other players.
Languages: English, Chinese (China), Chinese (Taiwan), French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese (Portugal), Russian, Spanish (Spain)
review_1: This game is good with few glitches like when I hit the ball the Force level has gone down or its a glitched hit but again people Please understand this game is still in applab and the creators are doing there best to frequently provide fun updates Please don't hate this game as it's still in development Remember this Please before typing a bad review And a Special message to the developer or developers Thank you for making this great and cool game for me to play with my friends. 2 NEW MESSAGES:, Please revert the glove to ball hitbox because I cannot hit the ball like before and it had cause me to start losing more than usual and also ease remove the roof from the daily tournament because thst had also caused very unlucky failures for my team.
